meta.title: FAQ - TradeSignal PK | Frequently Asked Questions
meta.description: Find answers to common questions about our trading signals, pricing, risk management, and support services.

noResults: No questions found matching your search.

q1.question: What are trading signals?
q1.answer: Trading signals are actionable recommendations that indicate when to buy or sell a financial instrument (forex, stocks, crypto, etc.). Each signal includes entry price, stop-loss, and take-profit levels to help you make informed trading decisions.

q2.question: How accurate are your trading signals?
q2.answer: Our signals have an average success rate of 85-92% based on historical performance. Each signal includes a confidence level indicator. However, past performance doesn't guarantee future results, and all trading involves risk.

q3.question: Which markets do you cover?
q3.answer: We provide signals for Forex (major and minor pairs), Pakistani Stock Exchange (PSX), Cryptocurrencies (BTC, ETH, etc.), Commodities (Gold, Silver, Oil), and USD/PKR exchange rates.

q4.question: How do I get started with TradeSignal PK?
q4.answer: Simply sign up for a free account, verify your email, select your broker, and start receiving real-time trading signals. No credit card required for the free tier.

q5.question: Do I need trading experience to use your signals?
q5.answer: No prior experience is required. Each signal comes with clear entry, stop-loss, and take-profit levels. We also provide educational content and risk management guidelines for beginners.

q6.question: What information is included in each signal?
q6.answer: Each signal includes: Trading pair, Buy/Sell action, Entry price, Stop-loss level, Take-profit targets, Confidence percentage, Risk/reward ratio, Market analysis, and Real-time updates.

q7.question: How are signals delivered?
q7.answer: Signals are delivered through our web platform, mobile app notifications, email alerts, and Telegram/WhatsApp (Premium). You receive instant notifications when new signals are published.

q8.question: What is the difference between Free and Premium plans?
q8.answer: Free: 5 signals per day, basic analysis. Premium: Unlimited signals, advanced technical analysis, priority notifications, historical performance data, 1-on-1 support, and exclusive market insights.

q9.question: Can I use these signals with any broker?
q9.answer: Yes! Our signals are broker-independent. You can use them with any forex broker, stock broker, or crypto exchange. We support all major Pakistani and international brokers.

q10.question: What are the risks involved?
q10.answer: All trading carries substantial risk of loss. Never invest more than you can afford to lose. Use proper risk management, always set stop-loss orders, and diversify your investments. Our signals are for educational purposes only.

q11.question: How should I manage risk when following signals?
q11.answer: Follow these rules: 1) Never risk more than 1-2% per trade, 2) Always use stop-loss orders, 3) Don't overtrade, 4) Diversify across different instruments, 5) Keep emotions in check, 6) Review and learn from each trade.

q12.question: Are you registered with SECP?
q12.answer: We are in compliance with SECP guidelines for educational and informational services. We do not manage funds or provide personalized investment advice. Always consult with a registered financial advisor for personal advice.

q13.question: How much does it cost?
q13.answer: Free Plan: PKR 0/month (5 signals/day). Basic Plan: PKR 2,999/month (20 signals/day). Premium Plan: PKR 5,999/month (unlimited signals + advanced features). Annual plans get 20% discount.

q14.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
q14.answer: Yes! We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied with the service, request a full refund within 30 days of purchase.

q15.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q15.answer: We accept JazzCash, Easypaisa, Bank Transfer, Credit/Debit Cards (Visa, Mastercard), and Cryptocurrency payments. All transactions are secure and encrypted.

q16.question: How can I contact support?
q16.answer: Reach us via: Email: support@tradesignalpk.com, WhatsApp: +92-XXX-XXXXXXX, Live Chat (Premium members), Response time: 24 hours for free users, 2 hours for premium members.

q17.question: Do you provide trading education?
q17.answer: Yes! Premium members get access to: Video tutorials, Market analysis webinars, E-books and guides, One-on-one mentoring sessions, Technical analysis courses, and Risk management workshops.

q18.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
q18.answer: Absolutely! You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. No questions asked, no cancellation fees. Your access continues until the end of your billing period.

q19.question: Can I see historical performance data?
q19.answer: Yes, Premium members have access to complete historical performance data, including win rate, average pip gain/loss, drawdown statistics, and performance by market and time period.

q20.question: How do I track my own trading performance?
q20.answer: Our platform includes a built-in trading journal (Premium) where you can log trades, track P&L, analyze performance metrics, and export reports for tax purposes.
